about.about_text: During my Information Systems studies at the WWU, I discovered the comprehensive field of data science for myself. Solving challenging and exciting tasks and discovering correlations in data and processes that drive the customer forward are the motivations that drive me.

experience.viadee_working_student_tasks: As a consultant in the field of data science, I mainly create proof of concepts for various companies in the Münster area. My tasks include the potential analysis as well as the subsequent implementation.
experience.viadee_intern_tasks: Development of a product that recognizes and extracts images and key information in poorly and diversely structured PDF files and clusters them to involved vehicles in order to make appraisal processes in the field of motor vehicle accident claims more efficient.
experience.utest_freelance_tasks: As a freelance software tester, I support companies via the uTest platform in maintenance and quality assurance, as well as ensuring a user-friendly environment.
experience.geomigames_leader_tasks: In this project, I worked with a team of 15 people to develop a card game that could be played with the help of a mobile application. In this project I organized the team and was the lead developer.
